meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: Look inside your <kanji>soul</kanji>. You see all the bits and bobs that make up your <vocabulary>soul</vocabulary> rolling around and around, being pushed by the Katamari <reading>Tamashii</reading> (たましい). He keeps your soul nice and big and safe!
